title: Illuminated Infant
description: Oil painting of a baby, exploring colors and light, inspired by impressionists. I was trying out some water based oil colors, wet on wet.

title: Baptism on Water
description: Watercolor baptism scene, in the inspired by croquis and religous themes

title: Proboscis Umbra
description: Drawing from a series of mask variations, usually following an insect, or similar impression. Charcoal on rough paper.

title: Cloak
description: One is a series of dark room photographs experimenting with various light exposure settings during development

title: Untitled Game Asset: Conch Enemy
description: Enemy design for an unreleased shoot-em-up game prototype. Will move in a sinewave pattern and shoot laser beams at your ship. Its laser would span the width of the screen, forcing the player to take evasive action.

title: Post Concept Cover
description: Cover for a conceptual comic book. A post apocalyptic desert adventure with heavy religious themes.

title: Stark Dunes
description: Wind swept, stark sand dunes. Ink on semi-transparent paper and rice paper backing.

title: Proboscis Canus
description: Insect inspired, hunched wandering figure. Part of a series of mask drawings and paintings exploring similar themes. Pencil on paper.

title: Ship Explosion
description: Ship explosion design for an unreleased shoot-em-up game prototype. It was meant as the player death explosion, as you're controlling a spaceship. Inspired by Metal Slug explosion style

title: Floating Island
description: A floating island for an unreleased shoot-em-up game prototype. Would bob slightly up and down, impeding the player

title: Development fluid experiment
description: Painting with development fluid on light sensitive paper. Hard to control the result, along with exposure to light, turned out interesting

title: Goat Boys LP Cover Design
description: Cover design for Goat Boys debut album

title: Canus Fratr
description: Pencil sketch of a proboscis gass mask. Part of a larger series of mask exploration.

title: Hooded Moon
description: Album cover draft for an electronica band. It was not used, but I still like how it turned out. Would need additional work, and is considered unfinished.

title: Proboscis Bibo
description: Marker and ink on rice paper, done quickly with a more cartoonish style

title: Self Portrait: Gesture
description: Self portrait gesturing, using ink on plastic paper

title: Proboscis_plicatus
description: One in a series of insect-like mask wearing figures. Was originally part of a website design, make sure to advance the image to the next one to see the version it would transform into

title: Midsummer 1
description: Part of the midsummer photo series developed on a darkroom. Later weathered and lightly painted.

title: Midsummer 2
description: Part of the midsummer photo series developed on a darkroom. Later weathered and lightly painted.

title: Midsummer 3
description: Part of the midsummer photo series developed on a darkroom. Later weathered and lightly painted.

title: Midsummer 4
description: Part of the midsummer photo series developed on a darkroom. Later weathered and lightly painted.

title: Desert Dweller
description: Partial drawing of a desert dweller, part of the post conceptual comic. Never finished this, but I still like it

title: Monoxi Player: idle animation
description: Idle animation player character sprite for an unreleased game prototype

title: Monoxie Player: jump animation
description: Jump animation player character sprite for unreleased game prototype

title: Monoxie Player: running animation
description: Running animation player character sprite for unreleased game prototype

title: Ink Character
description: Inked character in a rough style. Ink on paper.

title: Proboscis Ingens
description: Ink drawing of a insect like masked figure. Part of a series of mask drawings and paintings exploring similar themes.

title: Post Character: Angle
description: Character for a conceptual comic book called Post. A post apocalyptic desert adventure with heavy religious themes. Trying variable angle, trying to capture from below

title: Post character: Equipped
description: Character for a conceptual comic book called Post. A post apocalyptic desert adventure with heavy religious themes. Attempting to visualize an equipped character.

title: Pattern Composition
description: Ornamental pattern drawing, scaled and mirrored. Scan quality is not great, but I like the nouveau inspiration.

title: Pray Pencil
description: Two praying figures in the desert. Pencil on paper. Weathered

title: Domestic Gardening
description: Several logo drafts for a gardening company. These were rejected, but I still like them.

title: Salt Dunes
description: Salt/sand dunes abstracted illustration

title: Underground Dweller
description: Another in th

title: Untitled Game: Screenshot
description: Screenshot from an unreleased shoot-em-up game prototype. Game was in very early stages, so some post composition is done to give a full impression.

title: Sea of sand
description: Desert landscape, where the sand compacted almost looks like the sea. Ink on plastic transparent paper, on top of weathered rice paper

title: Proboscis Color
description: Watercolor drawing of a kneeling masked person. Part of a series of mask drawings and paintings exploring similar themes.

title: Stones study
description: A study of stone texture, drawn with ink on watercolor paper.

title: Thirst
description: Person arriving after wandering the desert for to long, captured when he takes his first drink when arriving at the settlement. Ink on rice paper

title: The Three Men
description: Three desert dwellers passing the time by playing card. Large emphasis on shadow and play of light. Ink on rice paper. Part of a conceptual comic book. A post apocalyptic desert adventure with heavy religious themes.

title: VLN Cover draft
description: Pixel art draft for an album cover. Not used but I got to explore text from that perspective, and general pixel art texturing

title: Wind Album Cover
description: Cover for a 60s inspired jam band. Taking heavy inspiration from other illustrations from the era of the bands style, and art nouveau. Marker on paper

title: Wrap
description: Cloth face wrap study, pencil

title: Paxel
description: Pixel art stylized gassmask used for a home page design

title: Self Portrait: Noir
description: Banner image for a previous gallery webpage called noir. Parts drawn separately, composed together later. Ink and marker on plastic paper.

title: Drainpipes
description: Drainpipe macro shot, developed in darkroom. Experimenting with printing light exposure when developing

title: Portrait: Per
description: Portrait painted as part of a celebration, only captured with poor camera, will update when I get the chance. Ink on plastic paper

title: Baphomet
description: A very large pixel art skeleton featuring the fictional plague mask.

title: Datorder Logo Draft
description: Part of a series of logo designs for a order management platform. This draft was not used, but I still like it

title: Untitled Game Asset: Cliff
description: Landscape asset from an unreleased, untitled shoot-em-up game prototype

title: Lamp Noir
description: A lamp face design, made to look like a glass painting. Cut with a laser cutter and cutouts painted in various colors, illuminated with a light.
